attributes.action: resign as the British people wanted Tony Blair as PM in 2005 and not you
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Resign as you have no moral authority to be PM. If you are brave enough, hold an election in the next few weeks, and see if the British people want you as PM.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
